title: Intro To Number Theory
description: Primes and unique factorization, congruences, Chinese remainder theorem, Diophantine equations, Diophantine approximations, quadratic reciprocity.  Applications such as fast multiplication, factorization, and encryption.
restrictions: __HEADER_0__Must be enrolled in one of the following Campuses:
prerequisites: MATH 2106 Undergraduate Semester Minimum Grade of D or MATH 2406 Undergraduate Semester Minimum Grade of D or CS 2051 Undergraduate Semester Minimum Grade of D or CS 3510 Undergraduate Semester Minimum Grade of D or CS 3511 Undergraduate Semester Minimum Grade of D
